downloadDescription: Crescent Girls’ School has been selected to be part of the Microsoft Innovative Schools World Tour due to being a showcase example of the following Innovation Topics: 1. 1:1 learning environments, 2. Virtual learning environments, 3. Physical learning environments

downloadFile.name: crescent girls school case study final.docx

detailsSection:
Crescent Girls’ School has been selected to be part of the Microsoft Innovative Schools World Tour due to being a showcase example of the following Innovation Topics:

1. 1:1 learning environments. Students work on their own devices and can use technology at any time to access educational tools.
2. Virtual learning environments. Use of technology to extend learning outside of the classroom.
3. Physical learning environments. Focus on physical spaces, seating, and atmosphere to encourage collaboration, creativity, and learning.
detailsSection_file_name: crescent girls school case study final.docx
installInstructionSection: Please Open file in Adobe Acrobat reader
